argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngcrescrhm.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 2 |  | rngcrescrhm.c | |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | rngcrescrhm.r | |- ( ph -> R = ( Ring i^i U ) ) |
| 4 |  | rngcrescrhm.h | |- H = ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_opelxpi | |- ( ( X e. R /\ Y e. R ) -> <. X , Y >. e. ( R X. R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. R /\ Y e. R ) -> <. X , Y >. e. ( R X. R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( <. X , Y >. e. ( R X. R ) -> ( ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) ` <. X , Y >. ) = ( RingHom ` <. X , Y >. ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. R /\ Y e. R ) -> ( ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) ` <. X , Y >. ) = ( RingHom ` <. X , Y >. ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( X H Y ) = ( H ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 10 | 4 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( H ` <. X , Y >. ) = ( ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_eqtri | |- ( X H Y ) = ( ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( X RingHom Y ) = ( RingHom ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 13 | 8, 11, 12 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. R /\ Y e. R ) -> ( X H Y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
